title: "Scraping Examples"
author: "K Arnold"
date: "10/26/2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
page <- read_html("https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/reports/statbriefs/sb266-Injuries-Causes-ED-Visits-2017.jsp")
```

```{r}
tables <- page %>% html_elements('table.pagetext')
t <- tables[[1]] %>% html_table()
```


```{r}
t %>% 
  janitor::row_to_names(2) %>% 
  slice(4:8)
```


## Wikipedia, multiple tables

```{r}
page <- read_html("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Forbes%27_list_of_the_most_valuable_football_clubs")
tables <- page %>% html_table()
rank_2021 <- tables[[1]]
```
